knimeNode.name: Cumulocity Device Retriever
knimeNode.shortDescription: Retrieves ids, names and types of the accessible devices from the given Cumulocity connection.

fullDescription.intro:
Retrieves the ID, type and names of the accessible devices by connecting to the Cumulocity API.
See https://www.softwareag.com/corporate/products/internet_of_things/default.html for more details.
This node has currently no options.

ports.outPort: Data table containing the list of devices, with columns 'Device ID', 'Type', and 'Device Name', of type 'String'.
